name: Idle Magic
description:
Idle Magic is a popular Idle game with the medieval magic theme. You will definitely be addicted to Idle Magic if you love clicker games. Recruit more magicians and warriors to defense the kingdom, as well as the Wizard, Ranger, Olaf and more. Try to be a brave commander in Idle Magic.
Here are features you can enjoy in the game:
Idle System
Recruit your own heroes, which will be fighting automatically for you to win the battle.
Manage Your Troops
Strategically arrange heroes to dig for golds, collect airdrops and upgrade skills to maximize your fortune.
Boss Challenge
Multiple bosses for you to challenge. Build your powerful troops to fight against them in time.
As the lord of kingdom, you’ll enjoy fighting against evil orcs in this battle. Be a brave hero in magic world!
